com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.ui

Interface Snapshot

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeforeMove, MoveDrawing, SproutAdd

    public interface Snapshot
    A Snapshot is a "picture" of the game board.

    Every touch event creates a new Snapshot of the game board. Every Snapshot knows how to render itself to a renderer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SproutsGameState gameState()
      Returns the current state of the game board as a graph.
      void render(ShapeRenderer renderer)
      Renders this "picture" (Snapshot) with renderer.
      Snapshot touchDown(Vector2 position)
      Creates and returns a new Snapshot by updating this with the position that the touch device detects on a "touch down" event.
      Snapshot touchDragged(Vector2 position)
      Creates and returns a new Snapshot by updating this with the position that the touch device detects on a "touch dragged" event.
      Snapshot touchUp(Vector2 position)
      Creates and returns a new Snapshot by updating this with the position that the touch device detects on a "touch up" event.

    • Method Detail

      • touchDown

        Snapshot touchDown(Vector2 position)
        Creates and returns a new Snapshot by updating this with the position that the touch device detects on a "touch down" event.
        Parameters:
        position - the position detected on a "touch down" event in screen coordinates
        Returns:
        a new Snapshot created by updating this with position, considering the "touch down" event

      • touchUp

        Snapshot touchUp(Vector2 position)
        Creates and returns a new Snapshot by updating this with the position that the touch device detects on a "touch up" event.
        Parameters:
        position - the position detected on a "touch up" event in screen coordinates
        Returns:
        a new Snapshot created by updating this with position, considering the "touch up" event

      • touchDragged

        Snapshot touchDragged(Vector2 position)
        Creates and returns a new Snapshot by updating this with the position that the touch device detects on a "touch dragged" event.
        Parameters:
        position - the position detected on a "touch dragged" event in screen coordinates
        Returns:
        a new Snapshot created by updating this with position, considering the "touch dragged" event

      • render

        void render(ShapeRenderer renderer)
        Renders this "picture" (Snapshot) with renderer.
        Parameters:
        renderer - the graphics primitives rendering object

      • gameState

        SproutsGameState gameState()
        Returns the current state of the game board as a graph.
        Returns:
        the graph representing the current game board state
